name: Cushioning Armor
text: You twist in your armor, allowing it to mitigate your fall.
prerequisites: Armor training class feature, proficiency with medium or heavy armor.
benefit: When you take falling damage, you can direct half of the damage to your armor. This damage ignores the armor’s hardness.
staminaText: You can spend 5 stamina points to utilize your armor’s hardness when directing falling damage to it. (See page 16.)
text_zh: 你调整你的盔甲，让它为你的坠落提供缓冲。
prerequisites_zh: 盔甲训练职业特性，擅长中甲或者重甲。
benefit_zh: 当你受到坠落伤害时，你可以将伤害的一半引导至你的盔甲。这个伤害会忽略盔甲的硬度。
staminaText_zh: 你可以消耗5点耐力来在引导坠落伤害至盔甲时将盔甲的硬度应用上去。
